# === Rails ===
# AI-irrelevant files for Rails projects
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Bundled gems
vendor/bundle/
.bundle/

# Lock file
Gemfile.lock

# Temp files
tmp/

# Logs
log/

# Compiled assets
public/assets/
public/packs/
public/packs-test/

# Node (if using Webpacker/Shakapacker)
node_modules/

# Coverage
coverage/

# Database
db/*.sqlite3
db/*.sqlite3-journal

# Storage
storage/
